summary: The customer was interested in upgrading their phone with Contoso Wireless and the agent informed them of their phone upgrade program, as well as a current promotion offering $50 off when they upgrade to the newest Contoso phone. The agent explained that to receive the discount, the customer must purchase a new phone and sign up for a service plan with Contoso Wireless and trade in their old phone. The customer agreed to take advantage of the promotion and the agent provided further details on how to do so.
